title: Personal Blog App
description: Welcome to my blog, I'm Md Kayesh a Senior Front End Developer, and this is where I share my passion about programming, design and development thoughts. I believe in a practical approach, so here I document my latest explorations. Learn about the latest trends, JavaScript tips, and user experience advice. Get easy-to-understand guides and personal insights from me.

title: EasyShop
description: EasyShop is the user-friendly and 100% SEO friendly Next.js eCommerce template perfect for launching your online store. With its clean design and customizable options, EasyShop makes selling online a breeze. Start building your dream store today and boost your online presence effortlessly!
